summary: Meet Aria Bal, a Daedra from Coldharbour, Molag Bal's Oblivion Relm. She comes equipped with Daedric armour and a Daedric Sword. She can be found in the Drunken Huntsmen in Whiterun, ready to join you on your adventure in Skyrim and beyond.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/ff8c2e1362c50d72a37287b894af9741/tumblr_ojqr4qpmEa1ubpgn6o2_1280.jpg[/img]
Meet Aria Lustfal Bal, Daughter of[/font][/size][b][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] the Daedric Prince Molag Bal.[/font][/size][/b][/center][/b][b][center][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
Aria is a standalone CBBE follower. She has a set of Daedric Armour and a single Daedric Sword. Aria knows some magic too, she can cast healing, bound sword and some Frost Spells
You can find her in the Drunken Huntsmen in Whiterun
(Thanks to SharzaaR for placing her in the world)

Story (The Child of Darkness)
Aria is a one of a kind Daedra created by Molag Bal and sent to the Mortal Word of Tamriel. While there she is tasked with learning what the other Princes are up to and foil there plans, but Aria says to hell with that and shes just looking for a good adventurer to come along and take her on a adventure, to see the world, save people and kill stuff. Aria may even join the Dragonborn in saving Skyrim and maybe she will even fall for them. [Thats up to you ;) ]

Spawning her
[/font]` Help Aria Bal
